section.title: tax types creating new Tax Type
section.para: To create a new Tax Type, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:
When creating a new Tax Type, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter a name to describe the Tax Type.
Enter a description to further describe the Tax Type.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without creating a Tax Type, returning you to the previous screen.
